title: Ivern Skin Idea
body: I don't actually have any concepts, I just want to know if we can have a snowday skin for Ivern were he is a Christmas tree xD

replies.body: What about Pool Party Ivern where he's a palm tree in a Hawaiian shirt?
Palm tree fit's his figure perfectly.

I have an actual skin idea for Ivern!

Make one based on that Jim Varney character (Ernest P. Worrell) called "Hey-Vern."
